conbody.p: The elements in the user interface domain each have a specific semantic purpose.

dlentry.dd:
user interface control
For example: Click File and select New to launch the New Project dialog.

Window title
Click File New to launch the New Project dialog.

Options representing cascading a menu
Click File New to launch the New Project dialog.

Shortcut
Click File New to launch the New Project dialog. Alternatively, press Ctrl+N keys.
